title: Jhumka Store
description: My first-ever website. A simple e-commerce layout that kicked off my web dev journey.

title: Portfolio V1
description: My first personal portfolio—basic, but it marked the beginning.

title: Dev Grade
description: DevGrade is a tool to assess your developer profile based on your GitHub activity. It provides a grade reflecting your skills and potential, along with embeddable badges for HTML and React websites to showcase your verified DevGrade.

title: Reserve
description: A full-stack productivity app built with Next.js 15. Helps users stay consistent with clean UI, fast performance, and simple scheduling features.

title: Decision Dex
description: A decision-making tool where users can set priorities, add options, and analyze choices with visual stats. Clarity meets action.

title: Streaksvr
description: Track and build personal streaks with self-assigned tasks. Great for habit-building and self-challenges.

title: Socially
description: A full-stack social media app with explore feed, followers suggestions, likes, posts, and more.

title: Spectra Play
description: A group project built in 20–30 days during my first semester. Learned teamwork, design flow, and time management.

title: Green Money
description: An animation experiment inspired by Pinterest. The dark section has some of my best animation work.

title: Space Explorers
description: A scroll-based animation experience with SVGs, smooth transitions, and text reveals. Took 3 weeks to fully optimize.

title: Dead SKULL
description: A creative animation project with 3D models, trippy background effects, and smooth scene transitions.

title: MORESPEC UI
description: A fun UI animation experiment. Learned why mixing plain HTML with GSAP has its limits.

title: Space Explorers (Raw)
description: The unoptimized version of Space Explorers—great for comparing performance and improvements.

title: Navbar Animation
description: One of my early landing page attempts using GSAP and Tailwind. Smooth animations, clean structure.

title: Loaders Pack
description: A collection of creative loader animations with visual effects and transitions.
